TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Nigeria, title = Nigeria, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nigeria} }

S.FORM: Nigeria hya' ga cyux maki' tay 10 00 N, 8 00 E na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 923,768 sq km (maki' tay 32ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 910,768 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 13,000 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 186,053,386. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 78% , lhlahuy hya' ga 9.50%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 12.50%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Abuja. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mawpuw byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Muhammadu Buhari, aring ryax 29 squ byacing tay 5 sa kawas 2015 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Nigeria hya' ga cyox maki' tay 10 00 N, 8 00 E na Xweco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 923,768 sq km (maki' tay 32ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 910,768 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 13,000 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 186,053,386. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 78% , lhlahoy hya' ga 9.50%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 12.50%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Aboja. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mawpow byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Mohammado Bohari, aring ryax 29 sqo byacing tay 5 sa kawas 2015 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
